DOOM 3 keyn funkar dock inte... in use vafan

Ah k, you can't let it connect to authorize server, so before you start the game just pull out your connection cable so it can't connect or have your firewall block doom 3 from connecting outside.

Once you have installed RoE this must be done everytime you wanna play the game, RoE AND Doom 3 (original).

It's a bitch so don't install it untill you have cleared doom 3. ;)
